mapper.insert: insert into lg_vehiclemaintenance (vehicleMaintenanceId, vehicleOperationId, mileage, enterTime, factoryTime, repairShop, maintenanceLocation, songCarRen, hourCost, materialCost, aggregateCost, majorrePlacementParts, damage, faultDescription, repairDetails, remarks1, remarks2 ) values (#{vehiclemaintenanceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vehicleoperationid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mileage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{entertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{factorytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{repairshop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maintenancelocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{songcarren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hourcost,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{materialcost,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{aggregatecost,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{majorreplacementparts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{damage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{faultdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repairdetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update lg_vehiclemaintenance set vehicleOperationId = #{vehicleoperationid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mileage = #{mileage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, enterTime = #{entertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, factoryTime = #{factorytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, repairShop = #{repairshop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maintenanceLocation = #{maintenancelocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, songCarRen = #{songcarren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hourCost = #{hourcost,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, materialCost = #{materialcost,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, aggregateCost = #{aggregatecost,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, majorrePlacementParts = #{majorreplacementparts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, damage = #{damage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, faultDescription = #{faultdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, repairDetails = #{repairdetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks1 = #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks2 = #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where vehicleMaintenanceId = #{vehiclemaintenanceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select vehicleMaintenanceId, vehicleOperationId, mileage, enterTime, factoryTime, repairShop, maintenanceLocation, songCarRen, hourCost, materialCost, aggregateCost, majorrePlacementParts, damage, faultDescription, repairDetails, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_vehiclemaintenance where vehicleMaintenanceId = #{vehiclemaintenanceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
